Hi 
Ia m using MockStrutsTestCase for my junit testing for struts 1 actions=
.

en setting the form using setActionForm (form) and then using actionPerform=
(); When it reaches the action, the form is a new form and no value is mapp=
ed in the form. 
Please suggest what is wrong ? Also if i use addRequestPar=
ameter() instead of form, the value is available in the form.
